definition: character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
to call into question/to question (truth or validity)

sentences.english: Is typical of China's coastal muddy silt.
sentences.chinese: 是我國典型的粉砂淤泥質海岸。

sentences.english: I am interested in meeting good people. I prefer quality over quantity.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡善良的人，我覺得質比量重要。

sentences.english: Effects of rice bran addition on farinograph parameters of dough and quality of steamed bread were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了添加米糠對面糰粉質特性和饅頭品質的影響。

sentences.english: Q is for quality, quality matters more than quantity.
Q is for quality, quality matters more than quantity.
King Sejong the initiative of the Han nationality's culture has been a qualitative leap.
sentences.chinese: 世宗大王的這一創舉使韓民族的文化得到了質的飛躍。

sentences.english: Many species of invertebrate have shells or skeletons made of calcium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 無脊椎類的好多物種有碳酸鈣質的外殼或骨骼。

sentences.english: In this paper, tectonic setting and associated rock suites of adakitic rocks are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了埃達克質巖形成的構造背景與岩石組合。

sentences.english: As a resul t, nacre thickness is sometimes just a cosmetic layer t hat can wear thin over time.
sentences.chinese: 所以真珠質的厚度就像臉上化妝品，不久就會磨薄了。

sentences.english: The currently agreed definition of homogeneous material introduces the concept of "mechanically disjointing".
sentences.chinese: 目前可接受的均質材料的定義包括機械拆分的概念。

sentences.english: Zhi imitated the natural sounds of wood and streams to make music.
sentences.chinese: 質“模仿山林溪谷的天籟音響製作了樂歌。

sentences.english: A daily conditioning shampoo to help protect hair, leaving it soft and manageable.
sentences.chinese: 能有效改善受損髮質，令秀髮回覆柔順。

sentences.english: Let's say that you're at a hair salon and you have very fine hair
sentences.chinese: 假設你正在一家理髮店，你的髮質非常的細。

sentences.english: They also help the body break down collagen in skin production.
sentences.chinese: 他們還有助於分解肌膚新陳代謝中產生的膠原質。

sentences.english: The thermal capacity is one of the important parameters to reflect the thermal property of soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤熱容量是土壤熱性質的重要參數之一。

sentences.english: Construction process of rock tunnels is a typical unloading mechanical process.
sentences.chinese: 巖質隧道的施工過程是典型的卸載力學進程。

definition: character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
